validateSolution

public static final void validateSolution(java.lang.String solution,
                                          java.lang.String problem)
Test to make sure the solution string is valid for the problem

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - is the solution or problem is null
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - is the solution or problem is the wrong length
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is the solution value doesn't equal problem value
